question: Which of the following crystals has the unit cell such that <katex>$a=b \ne c$</katex> and <katex>$\alpha=\beta=90^{\circ}, \gamma=120^{\circ}$</katex>?
explanation: The given parameters (<katex>$a=b \ne c, \alpha=\beta=90^{\circ}, \gamma=120^{\circ}$</katex>) describe a Hexagonal crystal system. Graphite crystallizes in the hexagonal system.
